A plumalitter, was a variety of litters in Maztica that had been enchanted with the pluma spell create talisman.
The entire litter was weaved with feathers. The litter was roughly rectangular measuring  long by  wide and  thick. It could safely carry up to .
The magic enchanting the plumalitter allowed it hover over the ground once the command word was spoken. The litter would follow whoever uttered the command word up to a speed matching a normal brisk jog. The plumalitter could alter its altitude at a rate of  per minute.
